==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=云}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|雨|云|c1=s|c2=p|t1=rain|ls=psc}}. Radical added to {{lang|zh|云}} to distinguish from the borrowed sense of “to speak”.

===Etymology===
Very few outside cognates exist. {{zh-ref|Starostin}} compares it with {{cog|lus|vân||sky, the skies, heaven}} and {{cog|mjw||inghun|cloud}}.

Alternatively, this is a derivation from a root meaning “to revolve”. Compare {{och-l|運|to move}}, {{och-l|回|to whirl, to circle}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
